item.title: IXL
item.description: Take Aways IXL lists skills that cover writing and composition. These skills are organized by grade, and one can just move your mouse over any skill name to preview the skill. To start practising, just click on any link. IXL will track your score, and the questions will automatically increase in difficulty as users improve.

item.title: Kids Love Writing
item.description: Take Aways Website Program uses technology, media, and video to give children an engaging & confident experience for writing. They help student create their own books! Students need help wwhen they struggle with writing and programs like this help mitigate the relucatnce with writing.

item.title: Night Zoopkeeper
item.description: Take Aways Platform that assists K-6 students in improving reading / writing skills. Not east to find platforms that help with writing. Making a game for writing is non trivial and they have done a good job by making it fun and engaging. They provide a writing tool which improves writing.

item.title: Time4Writing
item.description: Take Aways 8 week writing course taught online by teachers. From basic sentence structure to writing an essay The courses target are all age groups
